by  Benjamin FarniokPublished  April  

A woman was shotThursdayevening by police in Robbinsdale Minnesota PERIOD Her family has disputed whether or not the woman was armed at the time she was shot according to theStar TribuneBF1 PERIOD

The woman identified as Tania Harris was shot twice in the abdomen by police but is in stable condition according toa statement from Black Lives Matters.BF2

Hennepin County Sherrif Rich Stanek told that she was holding a knife during her confrontation with officers PERIOD

Staneks office is investigating the events surrounding the shooting according to the Star Tribune PERIOD

Harris mothers said Harris was unarmed at the time she was shot according to a report from Channel  Eyewitness NewsBF3 PERIOD

The polices attempts to vilify Tania and immediately justify their unnecessary violence towards her in the media reflects a larger pattern in which black victims of police shootings around the country have been demonized the statement reads PERIOD

The statement calls for government officials to investigate the event in order to hold the officer accountable PERIOD
